name: Carvity
description:
Drive in this upside-down road to finish the track before the timer reaches zero !

Controls :

Move forward = W / Z / Left Trigger

Move back = S / Left Trigger

Turn left or right = A - D / Q - D / Left Thumbstick

Handbrake = Space Bar / West Button

Respawn to last checkpoint = R / North Button

Pause Menu = Escape / P / Special Right

Note : This game was made under three weeks. It may have some minors bugs, as colliders problems or an heavy gravity for no reason, preventing you from doing some optional jumps.

Have fun !
